sentences.en: A six - rayed starlike figure optically produced in some crystal structures by reflected or transmitted light.

sentences.en: In 1979 M. S. Robertson gave a characterization of the class of starlike univalent functions.
sentences.cn: S. Robertson于1979年给出了星象单叶函数类的有趣刻划.

sentences.en: In chapter three, we get the upper bounds and some properties of the second order item of homogeneous expansion for E starlike mappings as well as some order items for one special E starlike mappings.
sentences.cn: 第三章在单位超球上给出了E 星形映照族齐次展开式的二次项和一类特殊的E 星形映照齐次展开式相关项的上界估计，并将其结果应用到单位球上的凸映照和 星形映照，得出相应的结论。

sentences.en: This alter - quality solvents presents starlike in asphaltum, and its size and distribution will influence capability.
sentences.cn: 这些改性剂呈星点状分散在沥青中, 而颗粒的大小和分布将直接影响改性剂在沥青中发挥其性能.
